premises: If the treaty is signed, then peace will be established
incorrect conclusions: The treaty is signed and peace is established
Peace implies the treaty is signed
Peace is not established implies the treaty is signed
The treaty is not signed implies peace is not established

premises: If the king is deposed, then the revolution will succeed
incorrect conclusions: The king is deposed and the revolution succeeds
The revolution succeeding implies the king is deposed
The revolution not succeeding implies the king is deposed
The king not being deposed implies the revolution not succeeding

premises: If the empire declines, then the province gains independence
The province does not gain independence
incorrect conclusions: The empire declines and the province gains independence
The province gaining independence implies the empire declines
The province not gaining independence implies the empire declines
The empire not declining implies the province not gaining independence
